text: @realDonaldTrump No wonder @realdonaldtrump's such a leadership disgrace. All he does is tweet, promote spreading Covid-19 at appearances or fm the White House, or practice making a big deal of signing papers & showing them to everyone as he claims "SEE...Look what I did. See how big my name is."
